tool_description: This API provides news and articles about culture and lifstyle
name: News Provider
title: News Provider

api_list.name: Get All News About Specific Topic And SubTopic
api_list.description:
It Provides news about Specific Topic And SubTopic. 
In order To know all available Topics and Subtopic please use the root of the endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-provider.p.rapidapi.com/culture/games"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-provider.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://news-provider.p.rapidapi.com/{topic}/{subtopic}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-provider.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
